title: Web Article Summarization
author: Shivam Patel
description: This FastAPI API generates summaries for any web article that can be scraped, given its URL.

installDependencyCommands: pip install --no-cache-dir langchain==0.2.1 langchain-ibm==0.1.7 beautifulsoup4==4.12.3 fastapi==0.111.0 uvicorn==0.30.1 python-dotenv==1.0.1
